Yesterday, the government just issued Decree
No. 97 to correct  Amending and supplementing Decree 81
2021 on the mechanism for collecting and managing tuition fees, according to
which after 3 consecutive years of government support to
keep tuition fees unchanged due to the covid-19 pandemic, in the
near future there will be a flat tuition rate for
public universities in 2020.  Tuition will increase to 1.2
to 2.4 million VND per month compared to the
current fee of 980,000 to 1.43 million
VND per
month compared to the old fee. Tuition ceiling for the
2023 2024 school year in the arts or arts group
increases  Insignificantly, the medical and
pharmaceutical sector has the highest increase in tuition fees.
Other sectors' tuition increases range from 20 to
30 minutes. Particularly for the life sciences and
natural sciences group, the increase is 15.8 minutes until the
2026 and 2027 school year. The ceiling will be  increased to 1.7
to 3.5 million VND a month with
training programs Achieving quality accreditation
according to standards of the Ministry of Education and
Training or foreign standards
Universities are allowed to determine their own tuition fees Decree
81  promulgated by the government in 2021,
regulating the roadmap to increase public tuition fees until
2026. However, due to the negative impact of the covid-19 epidemic
on the socio-economic situation,
the government requested that tuition fees
and universities remain the same.  Tuition fees have been kept unchanged
for the past 3 years, while
preschool and general education levels will
have tuition fees stabilized from the 2023 2024 school year,
equal to the 2021 2022 school year tuition fees
approved by the provinces and cities.

became complicated today.  Chau Thanh
district police, Tay
Ninh province, said they were temporarily detaining three subjects
transporting nearly 600 kg of smuggled fireworks from
Cambodia and Vietnam for
consumption. The three subjects arrested were Doan Van
Thanh, residing in Long An province, Nguyen Van Trung,
residing in Ba province.  Ria Vung Tau and the scholar at the

smuggled goods.  Cross the border, hire Thanh
to bring goods from the border area of ​​Thu Chau Thanh
district, Tay Ninh province to
Ba Ria Vung Tau province and deliver them to Chung for
consumption at about 9:00 p.m. on December 31,
2023 at provincial road DT 796.
Chau Thanh district police caught Thanh

kg of illegal fireworks and just three hours later, the
